summary: As the kingdom of Devigarh comes apart at the seams, an aging bodyguard attempts to protect the Royal Family, as well as keep its darkest secrets from ever coming to light.
cast: Amitabh Bachchan|Saif Ali Khan|Sanjay Dutt|Vidya Balan|Jackie Shroff|Boman Irani|Jimmy Sheirgill|Raima Sen|Sharmila Tagore|Parikshit Sahni|Adhir Bhat|Swanand Kirkire|Mita Vasisht
title: Eklavya
